name: Anaconda Snake Survival Attack
description:
Top anaconda games and Snake games 3d has arrived on Store with the extra attacking features of 2018. Anaconda Snake is looking for hunt in this Snake Simulator 2018. Play this game as Hungry anaconda snake, search for the hunt and attack on your favorite target. Play deadly anaconda! Clan of Anaconda. Play as a wild and angry anaconda snake on your smart phone, slay your victim, look and attack your favorite prey in this Giant Snake game and anaconda games 3d with the blend of wild snake battle and Snake Wars. May be you play many anaconda games but enjoy the latest new anaconda snake game.
Tired of usual animal simulators like dinosaur games, dragon attack games? Then this fantastic game is made with dangerous and poisonous underwater beast Anaconda snake simulator 2018! Explore the ocean depths, hunt sea animals, fight with different predators, find your mate and raise a family playing Sea Monster Rampage Snake Simulator 2018!
Enter a tropical rainforest and live the life of a poisonous Snake! Beware all, here comes the scariest giant predator super hero in town from the jungles of Amazon and it’s looking for food. Play Snake VS Animals attack! The Great Snake is always hungry. The spot is filled with all kinds of wild animals to target: hunt the Powerful King Lion, the clever Deer, innocent hen, rabbit, goat simulator, the Mighty Wolf and even fight with humans. Prove with your Giant attack that you’re the ultimate villain or superhero of this jungle.
In this Snake Simulator 2018 there are three different modes to play (Jungle Mode, Survival Mode & Water Mode). In Jungle Mode there are many animals which are used for Preys and some are used as family of reptiles as reptile games. In Snake game, Right is to Hunt their prey in this venom anaconda snake simulator 2018. In Survival Mode play as deadly snake, join the epic battle of hunger & survive alone in big Cave in Amazon forest. Snakes have many types; some types are deadly anaconda, wild python, angry black mamba & the king of snake Cobra. All snakes are quite dangerous some live in water. Flying snakes most dangerous and strong in hunting.
In Sea Mode enjoy fantastic underwater surroundings being one of the most horrifying creatures of the ocean depth – water snake Swamp 3D attack! Swim through beautiful oceanic surroundings, hunt fish, turtles and other sea monsters and have fun with Water Snake Attack Sim game 2018!
Anaconda Snake simulator 2018 is new game with latest features & best game of 2018. Just download & enjoy.
Features:
• Different Snakes to Attack
• Multiple Environments Including Jungle, Cave and big Ocean
• 30 Challenging Missions
•Multiple Skins
• Fantastic water snake simulator
• various types of different sea predators to fight with
• Smooth and easy controls to make the Anaconda run and attack.
•Fast and action packed gameplay.
•Plenty of sounds and visual effects
•Show them the power of that dangerous Slithering King!
